item.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
item.description: An almost 100 year old movie, based on a story likely at least a century older, combining aspects of stories who knows how old, animated for the modern (of the time) movie going audience. It’s the beginning of a truely delightful era–that of the Disney animated classics. While they’ve certainly got their problems (the rather traditional gender roles and Disney’s ongoing copyright battles to name a pair), they’re still something elegant and innocent about them and Snow White is no exception.
